verses.verse: And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, the blessing <S%H1293><s%> and the curse, <S%H7045><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, and thou shalt call <S%H7725><s%> them to <S%H413><s%> mind <S%H3824><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath driven <S%H5080><s%> thee,

And shalt return <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and shalt obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day, <S%H3117><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> and thy children, <S%H1121><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> thy soul; <S%H5315><s%>

That then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy captivity, <S%H7622><s%> and have compassion <S%H7355><s%> upon thee, and will return <S%H7725><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> thee from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the nations, <S%H5971><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath scattered <S%H6327><s%> thee.

If <S%H518><s%> any of thine be <S%H1961><s%> driven out <S%H5080><s%> unto the outermost <S%H7097><s%> parts of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> from thence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> will the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> gather <S%H6908><s%> thee, and from thence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> will he fetch <S%H3947><s%> thee:

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will bring <S%H935><s%> thee into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thy fathers <S%H1><s%> possessed, <S%H3423><s%> and thou shalt possess <S%H3423><s%> it; and he will do thee good, <S%H3190><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> thee above thy fathers. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will circumcise <S%H4135><s%> <S%H853><s%> thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of thy seed, <S%H2233><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> thy soul, <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> thou mayest live. <S%H2416><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> curses <S%H423><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thine enemies, <S%H341><s%> and on <S%H5921><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> thee, which <S%H834><s%> persecuted <S%H7291><s%> thee.

And thou <S%H859><s%> shalt return <S%H7725><s%> and obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day. <S%H3117><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will make thee plenteous <S%H3498><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of thine hand, <S%H3027><s%> in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body, <S%H990><s%> and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy cattle, <S%H929><s%> and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy land, <S%H127><s%> for good: <S%H2896><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will again <S%H7725><s%> rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> thee for good, <S%H2896><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he rejoiced <S%H7797><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> thy fathers: <S%H1><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which are written <S%H3789><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> book <S%H5612><s%> of the law, <S%H8451><s%> and if <S%H3588><s%> thou turn <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> thy soul. <S%H5315><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> commandment <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day, <S%H3117><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> hidden <S%H6381><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee, neither <S%H3808><s%> is it <S%H1931><s%> far off. <S%H7350><s%>

It <S%H1931><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> that thou shouldest say, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> shall go up <S%H5927><s%> for us to heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and bring <S%H3947><s%> it unto us, that we may hear <S%H8085><s%> it, and do <S%H6213><s%> it?

Neither <S%H3808><s%> is it <S%H1931><s%> beyond <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> that thou shouldest say, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> shall go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H413><s%> <S%H5676><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> for us, and bring <S%H3947><s%> it unto us, that we may hear <S%H8085><s%> it, and do <S%H6213><s%> it?

But <S%H3588><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> is very <S%H3966><s%> nigh <S%H7138><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, in thy mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and in thy heart, <S%H3824><s%> that thou mayest do <S%H6213><s%> it.
See, <S%H7200><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> <S%H853><s%> life <S%H2416><s%> and good, <S%H2896><s%> and death <S%H4194><s%> and evil; <S%H7451><s%>

In that <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> in his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> and his judgments, <S%H4941><s%> that thou mayest live <S%H2421><s%> and multiply: <S%H7235><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> thee in the land <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> goest <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

But if <S%H518><s%> thine heart <S%H3824><s%> turn away, <S%H6437><s%> so that thou wilt not <S%H3808><s%> hear, <S%H8085><s%> but shalt be drawn away, <S%H5080><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> them;

I denounce <S%H5046><s%> unto you this day, <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> ye shall surely perish, <S%H6><s%> <S%H6><s%> and that ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> prolong <S%H748><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the land, <S%H127><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> passest over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

I call <S%H5749><s%> <S%H853><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to record this day <S%H3117><s%> against you, that I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you life <S%H2416><s%> and death, <S%H4194><s%> blessing <S%H1293><s%> and cursing: <S%H7045><s%> therefore choose <S%H977><s%> life, <S%H2416><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> both thou <S%H859><s%> and thy seed <S%H2233><s%> may live: <S%H2421><s%>

That thou mayest love <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and that thou mayest obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and that thou mayest cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto him: for <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is thy life, <S%H2416><s%> and the length <S%H753><s%> of thy days: <S%H3117><s%> that thou mayest dwell <S%H3427><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers, <S%H1><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> them.
